body:
The TAU package has a configuration option for building with level-zero instrumentation support which we want to make available with spack installs. We can not find a way to get the location of the level-zero installation from within the spack build environment. Is there an existing package that can be specified as an external to give this information? Otherwise could a new intel-level-zero package be created?

@rscohn2  @frankwillmore  @sameershende
title: Need intel-level-zero package, or access to level-zero paths from an existing oneapi package
